member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateStringMatch(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the string argument matches an expected string.

The value of the argument to validate.
The expected value of the argument.

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateArgumentAtLeastOneRequired(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Validates that at least one of multiple arguments is provided. Arguments and names are provided in a dictionary.
member.param: A dictionary containing the argument names and values.

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateArgumentRequired(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Validates that the array contains at least one element.

The value of the argument to validate.

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateArgumentRequired(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Validates that the object is not null, and that if it is a string it contains a value and is not an empty string.
member.param: The name of the argument to validate.
The value of the argument to validate.

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateArgumentRequired(System.String,System.Collections.ICollection)
member.summary: Validates that a collection object has at least one value in it.
member.param: The name of the argument to validate.
The collection object.

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateArgumentNotAllowed(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Validates that the object is null or that if it is a string it contains a value and is an empty string.
member.param: The name of the argument to validate.
The value of the argument to validate.

member.summary: Validates that the parameter is not specified, as denoted by the "isSpecified" field.
member.param: The name of the argument.
The [field]isSpecified field.

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.Validation.ValidateArgumentRequired(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Validates that the string array contains at least one element which is not an empty string.
member.param: The name of the argument to validate.
The value of the argument to validate.

member.summary: Validates that a date time has been set (by checking that it is not the minimum value).
member.param: The name of the argument to validate.
The DateTime value.

member.summary: Validates that an integer is within acceptable range.

The inclusive upper bound to validate against.
The value to be validated.

member.summary: Validates that the argument is a UUID.

The value of the argument to validate.

Indicates if the argument is required.

member.summary: Validates that an argument is a valid qualified IHI.

The value of the argument to validate.
Indicates if the argument is required.

member.name: T:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder
member.summary: This class builds a list of validation messages and contains the generic business logic for validating objects.

member.name: P:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder.Path
member.summary: The path to the property that is currently being validated

member.name: P:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder.PathName
member.summary: The path to the property that is currently being validated without the trailing dot

member.name: P:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder.Messages
member.summary: The list of validation messages

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder.#ctor
member.summary:
A generic constructor; where no validation messages, or path is passed in
A new internal list of validation messages is instantiated as part of this constructor

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
A generic constructor with no validation messages passed in; however the path is specified
A new internal list of validation messages is instantiated as part of this constructor
member.param: The path to the property that is being validated

member.name: M:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationBuilder.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationMessage})
member.summary: A generic constructor were both the path and the list of validation messages are passed in.
member.param: The list of validation messages to date
The path to the property that is being validated

member.summary: This method adds a validation message to the list of validation messages
member.param: The name of the property that is being validated
The current value of the property that is being validated
The validation message

member.summary: This validation method performs a range check on a collection of objects.
member.param: The name of the property that is being validates
The value of the property (E.g. the collection)
The acceptable minimum value
The acceptable maximum value
member.returns: A boolean indicating if the validation passed

member.param: The name of the property that is being validates
The value of the property (E.g. the collection)

member.returns: A boolean indicating if the validation passed

member.summary: This validation method performs a match check on two objects
member.typeparam: The type of objects we are comparing
member.param: The name of the property that is being validates
The value of the property (E.g. the collection)
The value that is expected
member.returns: A boolean indicating if the validation passed

member.name: T:Nehta.VendorLibrary.Common.ValidationException
member.summary:
This class extends the generic application exception and provides a list of validation messages
The validation messages are populated by the validation builder; which eventually throws this validation exception with a full list of validation messages.

member.summary: the default error message that is associated with this validation exception

member.summary: This creates a validation exception for a single error message.

The error message.
